subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hiroki Kuroda, the only original starting pitcher for the Yankees who has not been sidelined with an injury, pitched well over all against the Orioles but gave away a two-run lead in a sloppy fourth inning.
snippet: Hiroki Kuroda, the only original starting pitcher for the Yankees who has not been sidelined with an injury, pitched well over all against the Orioles but gave away a two-run lead in a sloppy fourth inning.
